The two sides agreed to maintain close communication in different forms and steer China-US relations back on the right track of sound and steady development, for the good of the people in both countries and around the world.

The two Presidents agreed that their meeting is candid, constructive, substantive & productive. It helps increase mutual understanding, adds to the positive expectation of the int'l community for this relationship, and sends a powerful message to the two countries and the world.

Second, drawing ideological lines or dividing the world into different camps or rival groups will only make the world suffer. The bitter lessons of the Cold War are still fresh in memory. China hope that US can meet its word of not seeking a “new Cold War” with concrete actions.

Both sides increase communication&cooperation, each run their domestic affairs well&shoulder their share of int’l responsibilities, work together to advance the noble cause of world peace&development, make sure that competition is fair &healthy&does not veer into conflict.

2 consensus achieved bt/w the two leaders: 
First, as the world’s two largest economies&permanent members of the UN Security Council, China&US should make the relationship work & not mess it up.

We have patience and will strive for the prospect of peaceful reunification with utmost sincerity and efforts. That said, should the separatist forces for Taiwan independence provoke us, force our hands or even cross the red line, we will be compelled to take resolute measures.

1 important issue: President Xi points out that the one-China principle & the three China-US Joint Communiqués are the political foundation of China-US relations. Achieving China’s complete reunification is an aspiration shared by all sons and daughters of the Chinese nation.

China and the US are like two giant ships sailing in the ocean. It is important for the two sides to keep a steady hand on the tiller, so that the two giant ships will break waves and forge ahead together, without losing direction or speed, still less colliding with each other.
Fourth, strengthening coordination and cooperation on major international and regional hotspot issues to provide more public goods to the world.
Third, managing differences and sensitive issues in a constructive way to prevent China-US relations from getting derailed or out of control.
Second, acting in the spirit of equality and mutual benefit to move forward exchanges at all levels and in all areas and generate more positive energy for China-US relations.

4 priority areas China & US should focus their efforts on：
First, shouldering responsibilities of major countries & leading global response to outstanding challenges.

For China&US to get along in the new era, 3 principles must be followed:
First, mutual respect. 
Second, peaceful coexistence.  Third, win-win cooperation.

The most important event in int’l relations over past 50 years was reopening &development of China-US relations, which has benefited two countries&whole world. The most important event in int’l relations in coming 50 years will be for China &US to find right way to get along.

We should resolutely uphold the authority and standing of the United Nations, and work together to practice true multilateralism.
We should step up cooperation, and work together to address the various challenges and global issues facing humanity.

Tibet today is an important window of China's opening-up&cooperation. From 2016 to 2020, Tibet received nearly 160 million visits. The China Tibet Tourism& Culture Expo, Forum on Development of Tibet, Trans-Himalaya Forum for Int’l Cooperation are growing with vigorous dynamism.

Tibet today is a vivid portrayal of China's progress in democracy & human rights. All ethnic groups enjoy full&equal rights in political, economic, social&other aspects. Ethnic minorities account for 90% of members of various levels of People's Congresses&CPPCC.

Tibet today is a successful epitome of China's leapfrog development.Over past 70 years, Tibet's economic output has grown by more than 300 times, per capita disposal income of rural residents has seen an over 400-fold increase. Average life expectancy doubled from 35 to 72 years.

Under the CPC leadership in the ensuing 70 years, all ethnic groups in Tibet created the development miracle of a "thousand-year leap". This has brought about historic transformation in economic and social development as well as people's livelihood in Tibet.

Seventy years ago, with the unremitting efforts of the Communist Party of China (CPC), Tibet achieved peaceful liberation, and embarked on the bright path of socialism straight from the dark & backward feudal serfdom, creating the political miracle of a "thousand-year leap".
